Method.name: GetTrendTweets
Method.Implementation: set sql = "SELECT top "_ nMaximum _ " T.ID, T.Coordinates, T.CreatedAt, T.FavoriteCount, T.Lang, T.Place, " _ "T.Retweeted, T.RetweetCount, T.Source, T.Text, " _ "U.ScreenName, U.Name As FullName, T.CalculatedPlace As Location, U.ProfileImageUrl, T.SentimentScore " _ "FROM TWReader_Data.Tweet T, TWReader_Data.""User"" U " _ "WHERE T.""User"" = U.screenname and %sqlupper(trend) = %sqlupper('" _ query _"')" quit ..ExecQuery(sql)
